questions.question: I understand that my active participation in the SMP Mentor Orientation and all other SMP departmental sessions organized by the Mentor Review Board (MRB) will be mandatory.

I agree to participate in every mandatory meeting (two meetings per semester) organized by the MRB. I understand that failing to attend these meetings may result in the MRB asking me to step down from the SMP.
I agree to meet my mentees, either in a group or individually, at least twice a month.
I understand that my participation in the SMP as a Student Mentor requires me to stay connected to my mentees and provide mentorship through regular interactions.
I understand that my role as a Student Mentor requires me to be sensitive to the information and issues that my mentees share with me.
I will protect the privacy of my mentees by not discussing, sharing, or joking about what they have shared with me in casual conversations with friends.
I will protect the privacy of my mentees by not posting about what they have shared on social media.
I will protect the privacy of my mentees by not using the information they share against them.
I will protect the privacy of my mentees by not using information they share to pass value judgments on them.
I will protect the privacy of my mentees by not using information shared by them to coerce them into giving favors.
I will respect the agency of my mentees in deciding when and what to share with me.
I will not use any information shared by mentees for purposes outside the scope of SMP mentorship.
I hereby confirm my participation in the SMP as a Student Mentor.
